record.name: Standard Desktop Bundle
record.description: Designed for on-site employees, this bundle includes a fully provisioned HP Desktop and productivity software. Optional accessories are available at an extra charge.
record.detailedDescription: Designed for on-site employees, this bundle includes a fully provisioned HP Desktop and productivity software. Optional accessories are available at an extra charge.
record.options: <form><label id="opt1">(1) Performance Desktop</label><label id="opt2">(1) Flat Screen Monitor</label></form>
